bibl.title: Eupolis. Poet of Old Comedy.
bibl.note: Introduction. - The Fragments in Translation. - 1. Eupolis in Antiquity. - 2. Eupolis' Dates and Career. - 3. The Comedies of Eupolis [see in part. pp. 111-174: Demoi (Demes)]. - 4. The 'War' between the Poets. - 5. Eupolis and Comedy. - Appendices. Bibliography. Index.
bibl.seg: STOREY Ian C., Eupolis. Poet of Old Comedy.
Oxford, Oxford University Press, 2003, 8°, xii-441 pp., 5 figg. ISBN 0-19-925992-5. £60.

Introduction. - The Fragments in Translation. - 1. Eupolis in Antiquity. - 2. Eupolis' Dates and Career. - 3. The Comedies of Eupolis [see in part. pp. 111-174: Demoi (Demes)]. - 4. The 'War' between the Poets. - 5. Eupolis and Comedy. - Appendices. Bibliography. Index.
C.R. par Mario Telò, JHS 125 (2005) pp. 166-167. - Piero Totaro, Gnomon 79 (2007) pp. 577-581. - Heather White, GIF 57 (2005) pp. 176-178. - Cécile Corbel-Morana, REG 122 (2009) pp. 669-671.
